description: Originally meant going to a theater to applaud and praise actors, now broadly used for attending and supporting others' activities.

examples.translation: Everyone please come and show support

examples.chinese: 谢谢朋友们抽时间来捧场
examples.translation: Thanks friends for taking time to come and support

examples.chinese: 新店开业欢迎兄弟们来捧场
examples.translation: New shop opening, welcome bros to come support

examples.chinese: 有无论什么都会捧场的好朋友真的好幸福
examples.translation: Really happy to have good friends who support me no matter what
